New sculptures in RTC

June 11, 2010 at 12:39 PM in blog, wandering around

Yesterday on my almost daily walks around Reston Town Center I spotted two new sculptures cropping up in the park across from the Rolls Royce building. From the signs nearby they are made out of recycled wood posts.

The first new sculpture in RTC, fully assembled.

The second new sculpture in RTC.

It is pretty cool how they are propping the red sculpture up - a clue as to how it may look when finished? I don't know, but it looks good. Here's a picture taken a little while later (the next afternoon):

Second shot of the red sculpture going up, taken a day later

It doesn't look like they've made much progress, but we'll find out in due time.
